name: Angel Of Hell
description: During the years 1939-1945, many people lost their lives in what is globally known as the Second World War. Therefore, the population of sinners thrown into the darkest pits of hell increased enormously. This caught the guards of hell off-guard. Now the sinners are trying to escape their fate by  running away.  Help our 'Angel of Hell'  in defeating the sinners and bringing them back to hell to be punished for their wrong doings on  earth!
